ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We would like to acknowledge the funding from the SÃ£o Paulo State Research Support Foundation (FAPESP) (grants #2018/13465-5 and #2017/04138-8) and Coordination for the Improvement of Higher Education Personnel (CAPES). This study is part of the National Institute of Science and Technology in Pharmaceutical Nanotechnology: a transdisciplinary approach INCT-NANOFARMA, which is also supported by FAPESP (grant #2014/50928-2) and the National Council for Scientific and Technological Development (CNPq, grants #465687/2014-8).
